metadata.name: E-motion
metadata.description:
"E-motion" is based on the idea of bringing human emotion into data and utilize it on AI and machine learning research. 

In this project I used data captured from several painting composites and mental illness datasets (from Kaggle) and tried to find a way to approach the pattern structures of human emotions. 

The visuals were created on touchdesigner and glsl, and use data for particle movements. Audio made in VCV rack, a kind of Analog Syth simulator.

The buyer of this NFT will also receive the Full HQ Version (1920*1080 resolution,30 FPS , 2:53 length).
